about_the_game:
The Tower Of Tears is a non-linear Survival-Horror game that blends 3D metroidvania elements with light dungeon-crawling.

Struggle your way into the ominous floors of the tower and meet all of it's strange inhabitants. You are the latest Tear keeper of this place and it seems that they've been waiting for you.

What's the purpose of this old tower ?

Who are these menacing figures lurking in the shadows ?

Use the wide range of playful tools available to stay alive, they'll help you a long way to fight, explore and traverse this weirdly hostile architecture.

                                                  [FEATURES]

  • Tense, merciless combat & survival-horror gameplay

  • Multi-function Weapons and Tools to experiment with

  • Surprising and disturbing monster designs. They'll kill you

  • Open-ended exploration within a complex and interconnected tower

  • Collectables like wearable Masks, Musics and Cursed Arts...

  • Carefully handcrafted early 2000's 3D graphics

  • An intimate and thought provoking narrative to piece together

  • Full controller support

  • You'll Run, float, jump, cry, fly, get sliced and succumb into the dark...

content_descriptors.notes: Presence of disturbing imagery, body horror and death scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 1300 or Intel Core i3-7100 Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The Tower Of Tears is a non-linear Survival-Horror game that blends 3D metroidvania elements with light dungeon-crawling. Explore and fight or sneak your way through this menacing tower. You are NOT alone and danger is lurking in every corner. Use wisely every tools at your disposal to stay alive...
